description: Submit your favorite song request to FluffyRadio.com with the Fluffy Radio Skill for Amazon Echo devices.  Not only can you now stream FluffyRadio.com through TuneIn but also you can request any songs off our playlist.  Visit FluffyRadio.com to view the full music library!  #FluffOn
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Fluffy Radio to request Uptown Funk
Alexa, ask Fluffy Radio to request Adele
name: Fluffy Radio
shortDescription: The Fluffy Radio skill allows you to request songs to play on FluffyRadio.com
